about_the_game:
The small city of Felsde, where Oliver and his family currently reside, is a lovely and endearing place. An elderly man came to the family one day looking for assistance. He had a "message" to deliver, but the distance was too great for him. If Oliver could deliver it, he would offer him and his family enormous wealth, but only under the condition that Oliver not read the contents of the package.



Oliver accepted the call to adventure despite having never left his hometown. His greatest challenge will come from this new endeavor, because he is not well prepared for the dangers that can be found when being away from home.



He discovered a few characters on the way to deliver the package that might clarify the true request. Having a collection of books could aid in deciphering this message without having to read it, as they all provide him with sufficient knowledge to understand the dangers of carrying something he is unfamiliar with.



Oliver holds a special place in his heart for his grandmother because he has always regarded her as a source of knowledge and compassion. The supernatural assistance Oliver received from his grandmother after she passed away allowed him to move more quickly and jump higher.

Key Features


  • Navigate vibrant but difficult levels


  • Easily control the main character


  • Complete amazing quests
detailed_description:
The small city of Felsde, where Oliver and his family currently reside, is a lovely and endearing place. An elderly man came to the family one day looking for assistance. He had a "message" to deliver, but the distance was too great for him. If Oliver could deliver it, he would offer him and his family enormous wealth, but only under the condition that Oliver not read the contents of the package.



Oliver accepted the call to adventure despite having never left his hometown. His greatest challenge will come from this new endeavor, because he is not well prepared for the dangers that can be found when being away from home.



He discovered a few characters on the way to deliver the package that might clarify the true request. Having a collection of books could aid in deciphering this message without having to read it, as they all provide him with sufficient knowledge to understand the dangers of carrying something he is unfamiliar with.



Oliver holds a special place in his heart for his grandmother because he has always regarded her as a source of knowledge and compassion. The supernatural assistance Oliver received from his grandmother after she passed away allowed him to move more quickly and jump higher.

  • Easily control the main character


  • Complete amazing quests

name: The Secret Parcel Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer - 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @3Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU @4Ghz
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3

short_description: Oliver was asked to deliver an envelope, with only one condition, he must not read its content. If he did so successfully, he would receive great fortune for himself and his family. How is it possible to transport an unknown package? What if he is sentenced to death himself?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
